main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted by several witnesses in the vicinity of VIEUX BOUCAU, France on November 28, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped, approximately 15-20 meters in diameter, and emitting a brilliant white light.
The object was observed to hover briefly at an estimated altitude of 300-400 meters, then to accelerate rapidly and disappear from view.
No sound was reported associated with the object.
No physical evidence or residue was found at the site.
The sighting was investigated by the French Air Force and the case is being forwarded to Project Blue Book for evaluation.
sighted object: disc-shaped object emitting a brilliant white light
